references.reason: This paper outlines the capabilities of GPT-4, a foundational large language model, which is used as a corrector model in this paper, thus making it an important point of reference.

references.paper_title: Improved baselines with visual instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper introduces LLaVA, the base VLM model that is used for fine-tuning in this paper, making it an important point of reference.

references.paper_title: Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback
references.reason: This paper provides insight into the RLHF framework, which this paper draws inspiration from, thus making it an important point of reference.

references.paper_title: Fine-tuning large vision-language models as decision-making agents via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper proposes the RL4VLM framework, which directly uses environmental rewards for PPO training and is the primary baseline for comparison in this work, thus making it an important point of reference.

references.paper_title: A reduction of imitation learning and structured prediction to no-regret online learning
references.reason: This paper proposes the DAgger method from imitation learning, which this paper adopts to alleviate distribution shift, thus making it an important point of reference.
